titleStmt.title: SII 7.1025: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 1025. (A.R. No. 393 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
hara . svasti śrī . tiripuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīIrājarājadevaṟku yāṇṭu 10 vatu Etirāmāṇṭu Uṭaiyār tiruvāticuramuṭaiyār tevatāṉaṅkaḷum Iṟaiyilikaḷum kal veṭṭiṉapaṭi . periyadevar Irājādhirājadevaṟku 10 1vatu Aḷanta grāmasādhanappaṭi Utaiyacantiravāykkālukku teṟku melaitteruvil kiḻ ciṟakil tirunantavaṉam nilam nālumā mukkāṇi Araikkāṇiyum Itankiḻ
maṉṟukku teṟku naṭuvil teruvukku kiḻakku Irāyūr jātaveda paṭṭaṉ kuṇṭur nārāyaṇapaṭṭaṉ vaṅkipuṟattu Eṭuttapātapaṭṭaṉ vaṅkipuṟattu cempiyaṉ brahmamārāyar Uḷiṭṭārpakkal koṇṭa nūṟṟirupattiruvaṉ nantavaṉam kuḻi muṉṉūṟ ṟirupattu Oṉṟarai .. yumkiḻaitteruvukku kiḻakku kaṭalāṭuperuvaḻikku teṟku tirumukai tirunantavaṉam Uḷpaṭa vaṅkipuṟa
tiruñāṉacampantaviḷākam kuḻi nāṉūṟṟu Irupattunālum ... Iṅke vaṅkipuṟattu tevatattapaṭṭaṉpakkal koṇṭa tirukkuṟipputtoṇṭaviḷākam kuḻi nūṟṟeḻupat toṉpate kālum ... Itaṉ kiḻakku tirutteḷicceri Ellaiyuṟa vaṅkippuṟattu tiruñānacampantar kuṇṭur Iḷayakarumāṇikkapaṭṭaṉ kalikaṭintāṉpaṭṭaṉ tūrppil nittavinota brahmamārā
kālukku vaṭakku melaipperuvaḻikku meṟku neṭuṅkuḷattukku teṟku vaṅkipuṟattu Īśva rapaṭṭaṉ Uḷḷiṭṭārpakkal koṇṭa tiruñāṉacampantar tirunantavaṉam kuḻi Āirattorunūṟṟu nāṟpattu muṉṟarai Itil niyokappaṭi puṉcey Oṭṭukku Iṟukkum kalluvāy kuḻi nūṟṟaimpatu ... kiḻaipperuvaḻikku kiḻakku Utayacantiravāykkāl
tāṭipaṭṭaṉpakkal vilaikoṇṭa ccompātāṉtirunantavaṉam kuḻi Aiññūṟṟeḻupatum ... Oṭṭil kaḻitta Iṟaiyili nilam mukkāle Orumāvukku paṟṟu muṉṟāṅkaṭṭaḷai Ālālacuntaraviḷākam kuḻi Aiññūṟṟu nāṟpatteḻum Eḻāṅ kaṭṭaḷai nālāṅ kaṇṭam vikkaviṉāyakaviḷākam kuḻi Aiññūṟṟu muppattiraṇṭe Iraṇṭumāvum Eṭṭāṅ kaṭ

app.note: The punctuation . should follow yum instead of preceding it.

div.p: The inscription is built in at the right end.
Digital edition of SII 7.1025 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
